name: Stereotypo 2
description:
Score a stunning victory! Start playing right now! OK, enough with the stereotypes already. The goal of this game is to match suitable pictures to words. The Stereotypo game is back! We got rid of pictures and swapped them with photos!

Choose photos that match up to the task and reveal new stereotypes!
Unleash your inner intellectual! Many tasks in the game require you to really get your brain in gear. Don't miss even the slightest detail!
And just remember – if your associations don't correspond to what the writers had in mind, then you're unique!

– an interesting, fresh idea
– loads of albums with tasks
– intellectual tasks
– available in many different languages
